html: Verse 25 in the Book of Mormon (2 1 Ne. 24) is rendered "I will bring the Assyrian in my land" instead of "break the Assyrian," as in the KJV. The Assyrian represents the Gentiles, and the purpose of the Lord is to give all the gentile nations an opportunity to be numbered. with Israel (see 3 Ne. 30:1-2). The judgments of God will be poured out upon those who reject this opportunity.
